name: Alone (itch) (icecheetah)
description:
Pre Alpha

Only the most basic features have been added as I had to do almost everything by hand and had wasted a lot of time trying to wrestle a tool into doing what I wanted. 

Press space to view credits.

WASD to move, on the dark road arrow keys to change direction you are facing (i.e. the direction the torch is pointing).

Z to interact.

There are some clues about the plot in the assets.

There is also a point where the player can just walk into the void. This is intentional but doesn't lead to anything at this time.

Zue and xyr sister go to a friend's birthday party, but oh no! Zue's sister left an important part of her present behind! Could Zue go back in the dark to get it?

Alone?
